alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:50AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Crittenden, northwestern DeSoto and southwestern Shelby Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 250 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pinckney, or 8 miles southwest of T O Fuller State Park, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Memphis, Marion, T O Fuller State Park, Memphis, Walls, Pinckney, Southwest Memphis, Downtown Memphis, Midtown Memphis, Frayser, Lynchburg, Mound City, Gammon, Amanea, Wyandoke, St Clair, Presidents Island, Briark, Glover and Riceville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
